name: 1942 The Henan Famine
description: "1942: The Henan Famine" is a light rogue-like survival strategy game: years of war and prolonged drought have triggered a famine that swept across Henan. Countless people living at the bottom living in starvation and fear were unable to survive. Travel to Shaanxi without leaving home. You must always be on the lookout for other ill-intentioned fugitives and man-eating wild dogs along the way. Your choice will determine whether the team can reach the finish line alive. Early access introduction: Buy BUG to get the game The game item currently purchased is not the full version, I hope friends buy it carefully. Due to the limited manpower of the development team, it has not been able to conduct third-party testing, and there are many unknown bugs in the game, so we enable it on steam With the early access function, I hope that I can find some friends who are interested in such games, and give valuable opinions and suggestions on the problems in the game. Friends who are interested can give feedback directly in the form of comments on steam, we accept any Bad reviews from the game or entering the Q group: 6439333 (Mice Concentration Camp) Communicate with us immediately We may not be able to respond to all questions in a timely manner, but we will concentrate time to count your feedback and suggestions The priority will be ranked according to the severity. After the repair, it will be submitted to Steam in the form of daily updates. We will focus on discussing the suggestions related to the game, select a suitable development plan for the next stage, and announce the game. The early access stage will continue. From January to February, after the end, we will take the initiative to contact friends who have reported bugs and suggestions. The names of players who are willing will appear in the credit list in the "Developer Interface" to form a team. Players will encounter problems in the game. There are fugitives with different backgrounds, characters and specialties. Build an ideal team according to your preferences and help them escape from this disaster. Random events will encounter random events such as asking for help, begging, fighting, etc. Abandoned camps and materials scattered on the ground, players manipulate characters to interact with them to obtain corresponding props or information. Camping at night The fugitives will choose to camp at night. At this time, players can instruct them to use the picked up materials to build camps or manufacture Items and scene information needed on the way to escape from the desert There will be countless forks on the way to escape from the desert. Players can choose the road that suits them according to the information on the map.
